overview: Over the past 28 years Mike has established himself as an innovative engineering designer. Focusing on low maintenance, environmentally responsible systems, he has great expertise in low energy HVAC solutions, while his design for a prefabricated, multi-service module containing ductwork, pipework, cable basket and power busbars has been successfully used on numerous installations to date. Mike’s experience has primarily been in the hotel, commercial, retail, data centre and leisure sectors including projects as diverse as Centre Court Wimbledon and a theatre in Northwest China. Mike’s primary role within RED is leading the hotel and residential team, with projects around the UK and Europe, as well as Libya, Turkey, UAE, Ethiopia, and Vietnam.
